name: Mariano Montano
title: Programmer Analyst .NET - Fullstack developer
profile: Since I was young, I was always interested in programming and software developent. Along the years, I started learning different programming languages like Python and Ruby, but after college I tried to specialize in Microsoft's ecosystem with C# and ASP .NET, specially using MVC pattern..
During my free time I enjoy learning languages, reading and investigating about technologies, programming languages, software design and architecture.
Some of my main skills are being very adaptable and learning fast. I like working in a team but I don't mind working on my own either.
